description:
Rugged, extra-warm boots built for long shifts outside on snow and ice. The ThermoBall Lifty's upper features durable and waterproof leather, and warm ThermoBall™ insulation combats icy-cold conditions. Underfoot cushioning and snow-gripping rubber segments provide stability as you supervise the ski lifts or tackle your favourite snow-covered trails.

  • PU-coated leather with TPU overlays for added durability
  • 400gThermoBall™ Eco recycled insulation keeps your feet toasty warm
  • Rubber mudguard adds durability in high-wear areas
  • Lace-up closure with gusseted tongue allows for flex in the fit
  • Lightweight injection-moulded EVA midsole cushions impacts
  • Ground-contact injection-moulded EVA sole provides traction without adding weight
  • UltrATAC™ rubber outsole in high-contact areas for traction on snow and ice
name: The North Face ThermoBall Lifty II Waterproof Winter Boots - Men's
